rpc.trackingDetails: Regarding the RPC(remote procedure call) data, we do not collect request data or request origin. We temporarily record the request method names and IP addresses for 7 days to ensure our service functionality such as load balancing and DDoS protection. All the data is automatically deleted after 7 days. Only the amounts of RPC requests of users are recorded for accounting and billing purposes within longer time. https://unifra.io/

All the information in our logs (log data) can only be accessed for the last 7 days at any certain time, and it is completely purged after 14 days. We do not store any user information for longer periods of time or with any other purposes than investigating potential errors and service failures. https://blastapi.io/privacy-policy
